name: Neighbor
description: Neighbor is an updated remake of a classic Japanese horror visual novel. Take the role of protagonist Yuuki Kae as she investigates the mysterious and terrifying events happening in her new apartment building. Fully voiced in Japanese, and localized to English for the first time!
minimum_requirements: Betriebssystem: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Prozessor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Arbeitsspeicher: 4 GB RAM Grafik: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Speicherplatz: 1 GB verf√ºgbarer Speicherplatz
